hero.title: Get Discovered. Get Booked.
hero.subtitle: Put <bold>{{businessName}}</bold> in front of ready-to-book clients instantly. We've prepared your services for discovery—no ads, no hassle.

catalog.title: YOUR TERMS
catalog.description: Launch with confidence. You're in control of your growth.

preview.text: This is your marketplace control center. Once listed, you'll be able to manage your public profile, portfolio, and booking settings right from this page.

bookings.title: 24/7 Bookings
bookings.description: Stop chasing DMs. Clients view availability and book services while you sleep. No missed opportunities.

reach.title: Growth
reach.description: We put you on the map. Clients find and book your services instantly.

revenue.title: Fill Empty Slots Automatically
revenue.description_one: We handle the admin - confirmations and reminders are sent automatically so you never miss a payout. Fill empty slots at your {{count}} location.
revenue.description_other: We handle the admin - confirmations and reminders are sent automatically so you never miss a payout. Fill empty slots at your {{count}} locations.

promotions.description: Create discounts, special offers, and promotional campaigns to attract more customers from the marketplace.

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.description: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you leave. Are you sure you want to continue?

congratulations.title: Welcome to the Marketplace!
congratulations.description:
You're all set to start receiving bookings.

You're now visible in the marketplace. Customers can discover and book your services starting today.

Let's keep building momentum!

visibility.publicDescription: Your business is live and visible to everyone browsing the marketplace.
visibility.privateDescription: Your business is hidden. Customers cannot find or book your services via the marketplace.

booking.title: Online Appointments
booking.enabledDescription: Customers can find and book your services directly from your marketplace profile.
booking.disabledDescription: Booking is disabled. Customers can see your profile but can't book your services yet.

businessName.label: Business Name
businessName.useBusinessDescription: Use your main business name for your marketplace listing. This keeps your branding consistent for customers.
businessName.customDescription: Create a unique brand name for this listing. Use it to stand out in the marketplace and separate it from your main business profile.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.helperTextOn: Use your main contact details so customers can reach you. All inquiries will go to your primary channels.
contact.helperTextOff: Add contact info just for marketplace leads. Helps you track inquiries separately from your main business.

description.label: Description
description.useBusinessDescription: Showcase your business overview to marketplace users. This info is pulled from your global profile settings automatically.
description.customDescription: Let people know what you do and why they should book you. Keep it simple, clear, and focused on what makes you great.
description.placeholder: What do you offer, and why should people choose you?
description.noDescription: No profile description found. To keep your branding consistent, update your business settings—or switch to custom mode to write a tailored version for the marketplace.

primaryIndustry.label: Primary Industry
primaryIndustry.description: This defines your business's main industry to ensure you show up in relevant search results. To change it, go to <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

tags.label: Marketplace Tags
tags.description: Tags help the right customers find you. Pick those that best describe your services.
tags.addAtLeastOne: Add at least 1 tag to go live.

locationCatalog.title: Catalog Overview
locationCatalog.noLocations: No locations available. Please add a location first.
locationCatalog.description: Check which services, bundles, and team members are active at each location. To make changes, use the <assignmentsLink>Assignments</assignmentsLink> section.

visualIdentity.title: Visual Identity
visualIdentity.description: Showcase your business with high-quality images. Choose a featured photo to highlight your listing and attract more customers.
visualIdentity.teamMemberDescription: Showcase your best work and let your skills shine. Upload photos of your projects, techniques, and creative results to attract clients.
visualIdentity.addAtLeastOne: Add at least 1 image to go live.

portfolio.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop or click to browse
portfolio.uploadDescription: Upload up to {{count}} photos to showcase your business.

errors.fileSizeExceeds: File size exceeds maximum allowed size of {{size}}MB
errors.fileSizeWarning: Your file exceeds our recommended limits. We'll optimize it automatically.
errors.maxImages: You can only upload a maximum of {{count}} images.
errors.duplicateImage: Image "{{name}}" is already in your portfolio.
errors.waitForUpload: Please wait for the image to finish uploading

advancedSettings.title: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.description: Fine-tune how bookings, cancellations, and time slots work for your business.

bookingWindows.title: Booking Windows
bookingWindows.description: Set how soon and how far in advance customers can book your services.

minAdvanceBooking.label: Minimum Advance Booking
minAdvanceBooking.helpText: Customers must book at least this many minutes before the appointment.

maxAdvanceBooking.label: Maximum Advance Booking
maxAdvanceBooking.helpText: Customers can book appointments up to this many days in advance.

bufferTime.label: Buffer Between Appointments
bufferTime.helpText: Adds a break after each appointment to prevent back-to-back bookings.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.description: Decide if and when customers can cancel or reschedule appointments.

cancellationWindow.label: Cancellation Window
cancellationWindow.helpText: Minimum notice required for cancellations or rescheduling.

bookingConfirmation.title: Booking Confirmation
bookingConfirmation.description: Choose whether bookings are automatically confirmed or require manual approval.

bookingApproval.label: Booking Approval
bookingApproval.manualConfirm: You'll manually approve each booking request.

staffSelection.title: Staff Selection Settings
staffSelection.description: Configure how staff members are presented and selected during booking.

allowStaffSelection.label: Allow Staff Selection
allowStaffSelection.description: Let customers choose a specific team member during booking.

showAnyStaffOption.label: Show "Any Staff" option
showAnyStaffOption.description: Display a default option allowing customers to be matched with any available team member.

calendarSettings.title: Team Availability Controls
calendarSettings.description: Set what team members are allowed to do with appointments and their calendar—without requiring approval from the business owner.

allowCancel.label: Allow Cancel Without Approval
allowCancel.description: Team members can cancel appointments without approval from the business owner.

allowReschedule.label: Allow Reschedule Without Approval
allowReschedule.description: Team members can reschedule appointments without approval from the business owner.

allowBlock.label: Allow Calendar Blocking Without Approval
allowBlock.description: Team members can block time on their calendar without approval from the business owner.

blockTypes.label: Reasons for Blocking Time
blockTypes.description: Select which reasons team members can use to block off time on their calendar.

communicationMethods.title: Communication Preferences
communicationMethods.description: Choose how customers get their appointment updates and reminders.

email.label: Email
email.description: Send confirmations, reminders, and updates via email.

sms.label: SMS
sms.description: Send confirmations and reminders by text message.

communicationMethods.pushNotificationHelper: Push notifications are also sent automatically if customers use the mobile app.

customMessages.title: Custom Messages
customMessages.description: Add custom messages customers will see after booking or when reviewing cancellation policies.

cancellationPolicy.label: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.helperText: Shown when customers view or request to cancel an appointment.

reminderMessage.label: Reminder Message
reminderMessage.helperText: Sent to customers as a reminder before their appointment.

validation.minAdvanceBooking: Must be less than max advance booking
validation.maxAdvanceBooking: Must be greater than min advance booking
validation.blockTypesRequired: Please select at least one blocking reason.
